verses.name: Jeremiah 23:22
verses.text: But if they had stood in my counsel, and had caused my people to hear my words, then they should have turned them from their evil way, and from the evil of their doings.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:23
verses.text: Am I a God at hand, saith the Lord, and not a God afar off?

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:24
verses.text: Can any hide himself in secret places that I shall not see him? saith the Lord. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:25
verses.text: I have heard what the prophets said, that prophesy lies in my name, saying, I have dreamed, I have dreamed.
